patterns: how far is hostel from college
responses: The institute provides well-furnished hostel facility exclusively for males and females. The aim of the hostel is to make it a home away from home. It has spacious rooms with windows opening into balcony, other facilities include common room and dining room, Apart from the infrastructural soundness, it provides sufficient scope for interaction and relationship-building. It provides a congenial atmosphere that gives the new students full scope to know their seniors, learn from them, leverage their knowledge and build lasting relations with them. It is also a common sight to find study groups and project groups working away into the night in the hostel rooms. These interactions play an especially important role in a studentâ€™s life during placements and examinations. For hostel fee or other information go this website:College hostal

patterns: What resources and support services does the university offer to help students prepare for placement?
responses: To know about placement visit please visit your website College website
The placement rate for most programs is around 70-80%. However, this can vary depending on the program, the industry, and the overall job market.

A wide variety of companies recruit from universities, including large multinational corporations, medium-sized businesses, and startups. The specific types of companies that recruit will vary depending on the university and the programs it offers.

your universities offer a variety of resources and support services to help students prepare for placement, such as:  1.Career counseling and advising  2.Resume and cover letter workshops  3.Mock interviews  4. Job fairs  5.Networking opportunities

Jagannath Community College (JCC) is the first of its kind in the system of professional education in India to cater to employment oriented education to the Society.As the demand for skill education kept on increasing in India, JCC has been established to provide relevant training and skill courses and customized programmes for industry aiming to job creation. The programs are aligned with Industry 4.0 to cater to the market needs and to harness valuable human potential and talent of youth in India. The motto is Education for Employment through Skill Development.JCC is approved Skill Knowledge Provider (SKP) under NSQF by AICTE. JCC is also NSDC Centre of Jagannath University, NCR Bahadurgarh which is the Training Partner of NSDC, Ministry of Skill Development & Entrepreneurship, Government of India. For more please visit your website: College website

Interested candidates can register themselves by filling up Application Form available at the JCC Campuses. Availability of Application Forms in Person The JCC Application Form and Prospectus for all the courses can be collected in person for Rs. 1000 (in cash) from the Campus.JCC Application Forms can be issued through Postal Service by sending a Demand Draft of Rs.1050 drawn in favour of JaganNath Institute of Management Sciences, payable at Delhi the Campus . And you can fill admissions form online through college website or fill the form by clicking College Admission form

Annual Sports Meet offers a comprehensive range of sports activities striving to promote the physical and mental well being of the students. JIMS hosts its sports week every year with plethora of sports activities to inculcate the culture of physical fitness and team spirit among the students. The sports week includes various sports activities like Chess, Football, Cricket, Volley Ball, Badminton, Table Tennis, Basket Ball, Dart Game, Short-put, Tug of War, Races, Arm Wrestling and JIMS Marathon.

The 2 Year Post Graduate Degree Course in computer science awarded in India to IT Graduates. The program is inclined more toward Application Development and thus has more emphasis on latest programming language and tools to develop better and faster applications. The course is designed to meet the growing demand of qualified professionals in the field of Information Technology. It is a postgraduate course that can be taken up after obtaining a Bachelor's Degree in IT. MCA course

Eligibility: Recognized Bachelorâ€™s Degree of minimum 3 years duration in BCA, B. Sc (IT/Computer Science) with Mathematics as a course at 10+2 level or at Graduate Level. Obtained at least 50% marks at the qualifying Examination. For more details go MCA course

The uniqueness of the 3 years degree programme is that it develops industry relevant practical skill sets using Industrial Training Project and Final Project. It will enhance the ability to program the problems, web development, Advance Java Programming, Microsoft .Net Programming, analyzing and mining the data, exposure of working on Technicalities of Mobile Computing, Computer Network Security,Cyber Ethics, Software Tesing, Artificial Intelligence using Python , in depth knowledge of various computer Networking protocols and Technologies that enable students to have various job opportunities like -Software Engineer/ Web developer, System Programmer, Analyst, Database Administrator, Trainer, Networking Specialist, Network Security Specialist, Technical Writer, Search Engine Optimizer, Network Security Specialist etc. BCA course
Eligibility: 10+2(Any Stream) with Minimum 50% Marks. For more details go BCA course

The uniqueness of the 3 years degree programme is that it develops industry relevant skills in the area of Business Ethics, Financial Markets, Visual Merchandising, Financial Planning, Retail Operations and Store Management, International marketing and Customer value management. After completion of the course, students can find career opportunities as Merchandising Manager, Supply Chain Manager, Marketing Manager, Business Analyst, Financial Planner, Tax Planner, HR Manager, Developmental Manager, Team Manager and Production & Operations Manager.
Eligibility: Minimum 50% marks in 10+2 (best of four) including English.

The Two-Year Full-Time MBA programme consists of four semesters.The course structure has been designed to ensure that the students develop a judicious blend of strategic thinking, tactical implementation, specialized knowledge and general management skills. In the first year, the focus is to build a foundation of conceptual and analytical skills, required for pursuing specialized study in various functional areas. The students have to undertake Live projects and Summer Training.Student connect programme is offered before the commencement of regular classes to help incoming candidates cope with the Programme by offering classes that bridge the knowledge gap between the students coming from different domains & PGDM Curriculum.
Eligibility: Graduates or Final year students can apply.

Bachelor of Commerce is a three-year undergraduate course for students to develop inquisitive, rigorous and problem-solving skills to identify issues, relevant information and their efficient and practical solutions.It is also ideal for those who wish to pursue Chartered Accountancy, Cost Accounting and Company Secretary. After completion of the course, students can find career opportunities as Accountant, Auditor, Tax Consultant, Budget Planner, Economist, Company Secretary,Inventory Controller, Merchant Banker, Business Analyst, Finance Planner, Treasurer and Investment Banker.
Eligibility: Minimum 50% marks in 10+2 (best of four) including English.

JCC Fashion Design and Technology is among the most sort-after fashion design schools in India. The institute offers well-tailored fashion design courses for students, who aspire to carve a niche in fashion business. Our fashion design and technology programme train students to use colors, fabrics and ornamentation to craft different fashion items. Students can analyze recent fashion trends and learn about basic business and merchandising principles. The hands-on practice allows students to apply skills in interpreting and developing projects in the different areas of fashion, and add more value to their creativity.
